bug.author: laurentromary
bug.description: The TEI generic model for the element imposes that be set as its first (mandatory) child. See <denchmark-link:https://www.tei-c.org/release/doc/tei-p5-doc/fr/html/ref-teiHeader.html>ref-teiHeader</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: It will be changed in release 0.5.6 as last minute fix ;)
